decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (4392/1, received 28 November 2013) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved, without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The replacement windows and door hereby approved shall replicate the style and proportions of the existing windows with regards to openings, frames and detailing, with opening casement frames to be of uniform thickness with non-opening frames.
description: Erection of rear roof extension with 2 front roof windows and installation of replacement windows
